chess

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board class file for creating a new board and printing after every move
    Since:
    2019-03-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Hunt, Timothy Kinsey

        Returns:

      • getpiece

        public chess.ChessPiece getpiece(int rank,
                                 int file)
        This method is used to get a piece from the board
        Parameters:
        rank - this is the rank of the piece
        file - this is the file of the piece
        Returns:
        returns the ChessPiece at the given grid or null if there isn't one there

                     int srcfile,
                     int destrank,
                     int destfile)
        This method is used to move pieces around the board
        Parameters:
        srcrank - starting rank of piece
        srcfile - starting file of piece
        destrank - destination rank of piece
        destfile - destination file of piece

      • makePromotionMove

        public void makePromotionMove(int srcrank,
                              int srcfile,
                              int destrank,
                              int destfile,
                              char Promotion,
                              char team)
        This method is used promote a pawn upon making it across the board
        Parameters:
        srcrank - starting rank of piece
        srcfile - starting file of piece
        destrank - destination rank of piece
        destfile - destination file of piece
        Promotion - char indicating what to piece promote pawn to
        team - char indicating the team the piece belongs to

      • castle_into_check

                                 int filedest)
        This method is used to check if a king castling attempt will result in check
        Parameters:
        rankdest - rank of where the king is castling to
        filedest - file of where the king is castling to
        Returns:
        returns true or false if the attempt to castle while result in check

      • check_move_intoCheck

        public boolean check_move_intoCheck(int srcrank,
                                    int srcfile,
                                    int destrank,
                                    int destfile,
                                    char team)
        This method is used to check if a move results in the king being placed in check
        Parameters:
        srcrank - rank of where the piece is at
        srcfile - file of where the piece is at
        destrank - rank of where the piece wants to move to
        destfile - file of where the piece wants to move to
        team - char of what team the piece belongs
        Returns:
        returns true or false if the move results in the king becoming checked

      • getkinglocation

        public int[] getkinglocation(char team)
        This method is used to check if a king location
        Parameters:
        team - char of team of the king youre trying to find
        Returns:
        returns int array of size 2 with rank at index 0 and file at index 1
